plays.text: Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Interference Vyacheslav Kozlov
Penalty to Vyacheslav Kozlov 2 minutes for High Sticking JEFF JILLSON
Penalty to DMITRI KALININ 2 minutes for Hooking Teemu Selanne
Goal scored by Vaclav Varada assisted by Jay McKee and J.P. Dumont
Penalty to Scott Hannan 2 minutes for Tripping Vaclav Varada
Penalty to Erik Rasmussen 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Vincent Damphousse
Goal scored by Tim Connolly unassisted
Penalty to Brad Stuart 2 minutes for Elbowing Curtis Brown
Goal scored by Maxim Afinogenov assisted by Chris Gratton
Penalty to Niklas Sundstrom 2 minutes for Slashing DMITRI KALININ
Penalty to Alexei Zhitnik 2 minutes for Holding Adam Graves
Goal scored by Marco Sturm assisted by Patrick Marleau and Brad Stuart
Goal scored by Rhett Warrener unassisted
